alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Sandusky; Seneca; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 1:30AM EDT until August 25 at 2:15AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Seneca County in northwestern Ohio... Southwestern Sandusky County in northwestern Ohio... Southern Wood County in northwestern Ohio... Northeastern Hancock County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 215 AM EDT. * At 129 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gibsonburg to 6 miles northwest of North Baltimore, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Findlay, Bowling Green, Tiffin, Fremont, Fostoria, Clyde, North Baltimore, Gibsonburg, Woodville, Weston, Green Springs, Arcadia, Van Buren, New Riegel, Ballville, Pemberville, Bradner, Wayne, Bloomdale and Bettsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
